answer:
QUESTION

 I am a married women my periods were meant to be on 21 of aug but I think it extended, on 30 august i have some brown discharge but on 31 august it was all clear i performed ghusal but i dont know can i fast and offer my prayers and on 1 sep every thing is clear can u please suggest me what should i do its really painfull to miss the taq raath and the fasts of Ramadan. Please help me out. jazakallah allahafiz

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

The spotting that you had for one day does not constitute haiz, it was istihazah. Therefore, you should continue fasting and praying.

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best
Wassalāmu ῾alaykum
